what-i-do: Currently working as Backend developer at Razorpay. Looking for Flutter and Javascript projects to work in my free time.
about-me-text: Hi i am Sanketh. I am a software developer with strong foundation in data structures and algorithms. Actively working on projects with MERN, Typescript, GraphQL, Flutter. I also write tech blogs on Medium.
skills-text: I love to create applications with unique use-cases. I am more inclined towards the solution than the language used to implement them. I have also contrinuted to Flutter open source community.

projects.name: Dairyaholic
projects.description: Dairyaholic is a personal dairy application, it supports rich text, images, videos and cloud sync. It is written in Flutter

projects.name: Local Session Timeout
projects.description: It is a Flutter package which can be used for redirecting users to login page when application hasn't recieved any user interaction, or been running in the background for "x" duration

projects.name: Flutter Sticky Widgets
projects.description: With flutter_sticky_widgets you can use a widget as if it is position: sticky; in CSS.

projects.name: Clustering of News articles
projects.description: This project is about clustering of news articles from a big news data set and summarizing the news in entire dataset by using importaant keywords using big data tools.

projects.name: My Portfolio
projects.description: This is my personal portfolio. You are on the same site. It is build with Reactjs
